============
Contributing
============

Contributing to AeraSync
---------------------

Thank you for your interest in contributing to the AeraSync project! This document outlines the process for contributing to the codebase.

Development Setup
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork locally
3. Set up your development environment as described in the installation guide

Pull Request Process
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

1. Create a branch with a descriptive name
2. Make your changes
3. Write or update tests as needed
4. Submit a pull request
5. Address any review comments
